name: Eggy Bird
description:
Fly and collect eggs to throw them to the evil birds.

[HOW TO PLAY]:

-Tap the screen to flip the direction.

-Collect different types of eggs to kill the evil birds, each egg has a different special function.

-Throw eggs by touching the throw egg button.

-Avoid the evil birds.

-Win medals.

-Try to get the higher score you can.

Have fun!
